physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Extensive T-wave inversions in precordial leads V1-V4. Cardiac arrest at age 3. Ventricular tachycardia or ventricular fibrillation during exercise and emotional stimulation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Change in cardiac events and ongoing symptoms despite aggressive therapy, including ICD shocks during exercise.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe syncope and cardiac arrest episodes triggered by exertion; slight proximal muscle weakness noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms continued with significant events occurring at 3 years of age.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Exertion-induced syncope with cardiac arrest at age 2; family history of unexplained sudden cardiac death.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Episodes of syncope and cardiac arrest continued with age.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Exertion-induced syncope at age 20 months. Mild to moderate skeletal muscle weakness and decreased muscle tone noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued episodes resulting in ICD shocks.
